Package readers

Class CourseReader

java.lang.Object
readers.FileReader
readers.CourseReader
public class CourseReader
extends FileReader
Boundary class meant to handle reading and writing of files relating to Course entities

      public java.lang.Object getData() throws FileReadingException
      Method to get data from a file Overloaded and refined version of getData(String)
      Returns:
      HashMap containing information of courses read from each course's file
      Throws:
      FileReadingException - thrown if a file cannot be read

      Method to update information about a course
      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      Returns:
